title: Can the one walk away from you? If so, are they still the one? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maybe get rid of “the one” theory because the reality is that many people will walk into your life and many people will walk away. It’s about seeing that there are many people but if you realize that you two have a generally good connection then you must realize what was the reason why they walked away, if it’s something you did you need to be aware of that but if they did something and just walked away then you let them go chances are they will come back but if they don’t then that’s the end you can’t do anything about it.
